description:
Item from the Beck's Depression Inventory (BDI), a 21-item, self-report rating inventory that measures characteristic attitudes and symptoms of depression. [Beck's, et al., 1961 (PubMed ID: 13688369)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/13688369/)

[Search for all BDI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/sandd/variables?search=bdi)
